description: Three UK doctors who worked at al-Aqsa hospital warn of a "disaster" as fighting nearby intensifies.
maintext: And on Wednesday, the Palestine Red Crescent Society (PRCS) said six people had been killed in an Israeli strike that targeted an ambulance on the outskirts of Deir al-Balah. Four of those killed were PRCS team members while the two others were in the ambulance at the time, it added.
title: 'Deep concern' for patients and staff at Gaza's al-Aqsa hospital
